type_clues.question: What is the function of the hyphen in re-sign?
type_clues.answer: c) To join words into a single concept
options: b) To separate items in a list
c) To join words into a single concept

type_clues.question: What is the function of the parentheses in the text?
options: c) To join words into a single concept
d) To separate items in a list

type_clues.question: In this sentence: He had three choices: stay, leave, or fight. What is the function of the colon?
options: b) To join two independent clauses

type_clues.question: In the sentence: She loves reading; it expands her mind. What is the function of the Semicolon?
type_clues.answer: d) To join two related independent clauses
options: a) To separate items in a complex list
d) To join two related independent clauses

type_clues.question: In the sentence The result was unexpected—completely out of the blue. What is the function of the em dash?
type_clues.answer: c) To add emphasis or additional information
options: a) To separate items in a list
b) To join words into a single concept
c) To add emphasis or additional information

type_clues.question: In the sentence: He was thinking... but couldn't decide. What is the function of the ellipsis?
type_clues.answer: b) To show an omission or pause
options: b) To show an omission or pause
c) To join words into a single concept
d) To separate items in a list
